message.content:
The following is an example of a personal development plan for improving communication skills:

Objective: Improve overall communication skills, focusing on active listening and effective expression to enhance relationships and teamwork in both personal and professional settings.

Goal 1: Enhance listening skills

1.1 Action step: Attend a workshop or seminar on active listening
- Timeframe: Within the next three months
- Resources needed: Workshop fee, time off from work if necessary

1.2 Action step: Practice active listening with friends, family members, or colleagues at least twice per week
- Timeframe: Ongoing
- Resources needed: Willing conversation partners; possibly books or videos about active listening techniques for reference 

Goal 2 : Develop stronger nonverbal communication

2.1 Action step : Research non-verbal cues through books or online resources 
-Time frame : Within the first month 
-resources needesd ; Internet access , time set aside to study 

2.2 action steps put learning into practice by being more conscious /aware of body language during conversations.
-Time frame ongoing 
-resource - conversation partners , self reflection tool (e.g journal )

Goal 3 Become better at expressing myself verbally :

3.1 action steps build vocabulary by reading widely including novels ,
non-fiction , blog's etc.
-Time besd 4 hours per week (ongoing) 
-resource book store membership /library card
 
3 . join local toastmasters club to helpbuild public speech practices basedskills )and(confidence sharing in ideas)
-time required attend bi-weekly meetings within next six )(months;
-resource meeting location ,toastmaster annual dues/ fees.


Goal4 improve writing abilities:;
